ComicInfo.Title: Serpent from the Heavens; Last Flight of the Valkyries!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Serpent from the Heavens: Thor returns to Asgard with Tyr to demand from Odin why Tyr was sent to attack him on Midgard.
Last Flight of the Valkyries!: Odin's Valkyries are killed during the battle to free Valhalla.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:24:53. [Issue ID 35825]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Doug Moench,Mark Gruenwald,Ralph Macchio,Keith Pollard,Doug Moench,Mark Gruenwald,Ralph Macchio,Keith Pollard
ComicInfo.Inker: Gene Day,Chic Stone,Keith Pollard,Frank Giacoia,Dave Simons,Al Milgrom,Gene Day,Chic Stone,Keith Pollard,Frank Giacoia,Dave Simons,Al Milgrom
